directions: Rinse zucchini and slice into  1/2 inch rounds. Place zucchini pieces into a large bowl and cover with salad dressing. Stir to coat, cover and refrigerate for two to three hours.
Preheat the grill for high heat. Lightly oil grate and place zucchini on to grill. Cook 3 to 4 minutes on each side or until done.
title: Give Away Zucchini Grill Out
